channel.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
channel.description: Hey Guys, I need help with my Dialogue. I really need help.

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

In another Post, it’s in Client Help.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:14, topic:403515”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=500575.msg3665093#msg3665093 date=1310579746]
Server help is not for teamviewing. We are trying to help you without controlling your comp and spoonfeeding you, but you can’t do simple baby steps. If you don’t understand what actionbutton ID is, then ask. If you don’t get how to use buttons, then ask. Not “Can you teamview me?” And I bet when someone is teamviewing you, you go to sleep and let them do it. Don’t even put yourself as a coder because the people who helped you with everything are the coders. Thanks.

PM me your tv id and pass, i’ll help as much as i can, not so good with Delta. Also, show me the client error with PI.
[/quote]If you patronize him, he isn’t learning anything. Server help is for learning and taking higher steps in coding RSPS.

Well, I’m just gonna TRY to fix the PI error client because it’s simple. I know though, i’m not gonna help with everything just that error.[/quote]Where does it say he’s using PI?..

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

usman555:

Server help is not for teamviewing. We are trying to help you without controlling your comp and spoonfeeding you, but you can’t do simple baby steps. If you don’t understand what actionbutton ID is, then ask. If you don’t get how to use buttons, then ask. Not “Can you teamview me?” And I bet when someone is teamviewing you, you go to sleep and let them do it. Don’t even put yourself as a coder because the people who helped you with everything are the coders. Thanks.

DW about it anymore…

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:13, topic:403515”]Server help is not for teamviewing. We are trying to help you without controlling your comp and spoonfeeding you, but you can’t do simple baby steps. If you don’t understand what actionbutton ID is, then ask. If you don’t get how to use buttons, then ask. Not “Can you teamview me?” And I bet when someone is teamviewing you, you go to sleep and let them do it. Don’t even put yourself as a coder because the people who helped you with everything are the coders. Thanks.

[quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=500575.msg3665083#msg3665083 date=1310579293]
PM me your tv id and pass, i’ll help as much as i can, not so good with Delta. Also, show me the client error with PI.
[/quote]If you patronize him, he isn’t learning anything. Server help is for learning and taking higher steps in coding RSPS.[/quote]
Well, I’m just gonna TRY to fix the PI error client because it’s simple. I know though, i’m not gonna help with everything just that error.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Server help is not for teamviewing. We are trying to help you without controlling your comp and spoonfeeding you, but you can’t do simple baby steps. If you don’t understand what actionbutton ID is, then ask. If you don’t get how to use buttons, then ask. Not “Can you teamview me?” And I bet when someone is teamviewing you, you go to sleep and let them do it. Don’t even put yourself as a coder because the people who helped you with everything are the coders. Thanks.

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:12, topic:403515”]PM me your tv id and pass, i’ll help as much as i can, not so good with Delta. Also, show me the client error with PI.[/quote]If you patronize him, he isn’t learning anything. Server help is for learning and taking higher steps in coding RSPS. If people continue to spoonfeed, it increases the misunderstanding of coding in RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:10, topic:403515”][quote author=SacredHeart link=topic=500575.msg3664736#msg3664736 date=1310555410]
I’ve add all the speaking and stuff. But when I added an option I need help on how to make it do stuff.
[/quote]Ok, so you get the actionbutton ID of when you clicked an option, then tell me the actionbutton ID.

Yes = actionbutton ID
No = actionbutton ID (tell us the ID for both of the things you click)[/quote]
Can you please teamview, i’m soo confused.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:9, topic:403515”]I’ve add all the speaking and stuff. But when I added an option I need help on how to make it do stuff.[/quote]Ok, so you get the actionbutton ID of when you clicked an option, then tell me the actionbutton ID.

Yes = actionbutton ID
No = actionbutton ID (tell us the ID for both of the things you click)

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

You need to explain the issue if anyone is going to help to the best of your ability. We aren’t just willing to just Teamview people.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Dialog Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:6, topic:403515”][quote author=SacredHeart link=topic=500575.msg3661039#msg3661039 date=1310352809]

[quote author=usman555 link=topic=500575.msg3661035#msg3661035 date=1310352770]

Ok, you need help with your dialogue. So how can I actually help with your dialogue?

Team view me.
[/quote]No.

Please…
[/quote]Why don’t you just explain the problem. I’m good with Delta.[/quote]
I can’t explain it, it’s to complicated.

Read full topic
